jobDescription: What we offer:16 years of experience, 100 agents and growing!Two convenient Manhattan locations!High commission splits right from the startExclusive properties.Relocation accounts.Integrated CRM.Unlimited client leads!Team opportunities!Best training there is in Manhattan including real estate seminars, social media education and one-on-one mentoring!24/7 support from our dedicated staff!Real estate education reimbursement programReduced gym membershipHealth Insurance opportunitiesIn our company, there are NO hidden feesLatest technologyWe will teach you techniques for acquiring your own exclusive listingsMarketing budget for each agentMonthly bonuses and company eventsGreat culture and working environmentQualifications:Licensed Real Estate Agent or be taking the licensing courses (We can assist!)Must be drivenPC savvyGreat communication skillsFlexibleEager to learn and earn!Knowledge of NYC real estate is preferredMultitaskerWell organized**All we expect from you is your commitment and drive! ***
